name: Food Comes From Above
description:
A simple and fun game of collecting food, the more you collect, the faster the game will become, but be careful, because not everything is food.

Use the arrow keys on your keyboard or mouse to move the player sideways to collect food.

Collect to increase your Score:

Chicken, 3 points score
Burger, 2 point score
Pizza, 1 point score
Cake, 1 point score

The bowling ball reduces your health!
